name: Space Eater (Zbordek)
description:
This game is an entry for 2021 Epic MegaJam.

  • Team Name - Zbordek 
  • Each Team Member's Name and Email Address associated with your Epic Games account:
    • Wiktor Zborowski - zbordek123@gmail.com
  • Game Name - Space Eater

_____________________________

Space Eater is a game in which the player takes control of a cursor in a computer that is under the attack of a virus. Computer space starts to fill with different kinds of viruses - such as DOC-DOXXER, SmileStealer, and... Unreal Engine 6.

You are constantly losing space whenever any virus is active, so make sure to find the danger fast, by looking through the folders and removing them from your computer.

Each kind of virus has different mechanics, so the cursor has to adapt to what's going on.

Playable with a controller and a keyboard!

_____________________________

Almost all of the assets that appear in-game and trailer were created solely by me and done during the time of jam (started on Sunday). There are two exceptions to what I just said:

  • The image used for the background of the desktop was made by my friend for a game that we have done before. The game is called Backyard Drunks and you can find more info about it here.
  • The game uses Rockwell Condensed font, which can be found here
